descriptions: Developed and maintained web applications using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js).
Collaborated with the development team to design, develop, and implement responsive user interfaces with React.js.
Gained hands-on experience in building RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express.js for seamless front-end and back-end communication.
Assisted in database management and schema design using MongoDB.
Participated in code reviews and contributed to improving code quality and application performance.
